mapper.select: select a.id as applyId, a.experience_program_id, a.apply_status, date_format(a.created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d') as applyCreatedDatetime, ep.experience_program_title, ep.experience_program_job, ep.experience_program_deadline, ep.experience_program_status, ep.experience_program_level, ep.experience_program_recruitment_count, (select count(*) from tbl_apply where experience_program_id = ep.id and apply_status != 'cancelled') as applicantCount, c.corp_company_name from tbl_apply a left join tbl_experience_program ep on a.experience_program_id = ep.id left join tbl_corp c on ep.corp_id = c.id where a.member_id = #{memberId} order by a.created_datetime desc
